      • exit

        public static void exit(int n,
        RdpJPanel rdp,
        RdesktopJFrame window,
        boolean sysexit)
        Disconnects from the server connected to through rdp and destroys the RdesktopFrame window.

        Exits the application iff sysexit == true, providing return value n to the operating system.

        Parameters:
        n -
        rdp -
        window -
        sysexit -

      • customError

        public static void customError(java.lang.String emsg,
               RdpJPanel RdpLayer,
               RdesktopJFrame window,
               boolean sysexit)
        Displays an error dialog via the RdesktopFrame window containing the customised message emsg, and reports this through the logging system.

        The application then exits iff sysexit == true

        Parameters:
        emsg -
        RdpLayer -
        window -
        sysexit -

      • error

        public static void error(java.lang.Exception e,
         RdpJPanel RdpLayer,
         RdesktopJFrame window,
         boolean sysexit)
        Displays details of the Exception e in an error dialog via the RdesktopFrame window and reports this through the logger, then prints a stack trace.

        The application then exits iff sysexit == true

        Parameters:
        e -
        RdpLayer -
        window -
        sysexit -
